home.title: Vietnam Powerlifting Federation
home.subtitle: The National Governing Body for Powerlifting in Vietnam
home.description: Vietnam Powerlifting Federation is the National Governing Body for the sport of Powerlifting in Vietnam. We are responsible for the development, promotion, and regulation of Powerlifting throughout Vietnam.

about.title: About Vietnam Powerlifting Federation
about.missionText: To promote and develop the sport of Powerlifting throughout Vietnam, ensuring fair competition and supporting athletes at all levels.
about.visionText: To be the leading Powerlifting organization in Vietnam, recognized for excellence, integrity, and athlete development.
about.integrityText: We maintain the highest standards of fairness and ethical conduct.
about.excellenceText: We strive for excellence in all aspects of our organization.
about.inclusivityText: We welcome athletes of all backgrounds and abilities.

membership.title: Membership
membership.description: Join British Powerlifting and become part of our growing community of athletes, coaches, and supporters.

championships.title: Championships
championships.description: British Powerlifting hosts a variety of championships throughout the year for athletes of all levels.

news.title: News & Updates
news.description: Stay up to date with the latest news, announcements, and updates from British Powerlifting.
news.noNews: No news articles available at this time.

contact.title: Contact Us
contact.description: Get in touch with Vietnam Powerlifting Federation. We're here to help with any questions or inquiries.
contact.name: Name
